GapFillDragDrop.Title: Present simple: time expressions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct answers to the spaces.

Content.Question:
1. I never get up early at the weekend.
2. Sarah usually meets friends on Saturday.
3. I sometimes play tennis in the evening.
4. He doesn’t usually watch TV in the morning.
5. We go to the cinema every weekend.
6. I start work early every Monday.
7. She usually listens to music in the evening.
8. They play football every Saturday at ten o’clock.
9. We usually stay in on Sunday.
10. I sometimes do my homework on Friday afternoon.
